Class Capsule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelInstance
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics3d.shapes.Shape3D
        • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics3d.shapes.Capsule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.RenderableProvider, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class Capsule
extends Shape3D
    An extension of the Shape3D class that creates a capsule.
    Author:
    Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Capsule

        public Capsule(float radius,
               float height,
               int divisions,
               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Creates a capsule by providing its dimensions and color.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the capsule.
        height - The height of the capsule.
        divisions - The amount of divisions the capsule will have.
        color - The color of the capsule.

      • Capsule

        public Capsule(float radius,
               float height,
               int divisions,
               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
        Creates a capsule by providing its dimensions and wrapping texture.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the capsule.
        height - The height of the capsule.
        divisions - The amount of divisions the capsule will have.
        texture - The wrapping texture applied to the capsule.
